description: This file is the entry point of a React-based weather dashboard frontend project. It imports core React libraries, app component, and CSS, and initializes the React app. It also contains a runtime warning function that checks environment variables related to the OpenWeather API key and logs warnings if misconfigured.

methods.name: warnMissingOpenWeatherKeyOnce
methods.description: A self-invoking function that checks environment variables related to the OpenWeather API key and emits console warnings if they are improperly configured or missing.
